hesml.benchmarks.impl

Class WordPairSimilarity

  • java.lang.Object
    • hesml.benchmarks.impl.WordPairSimilarity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<WordPairSimilarity>

    class WordPairSimilarity
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<WordPairSimilarity>
    This class encapsulates two words and their baseline similarity. The class is used to store one word pair in order to run the word similarity benchmarks.
    Author:
    j.lastra
